channel.title: event on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in event on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Announcing December PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project will happen tomorrow, on Wednesday, December 14th, 2022 at 4pm CET! I expect to share with you project news. Additionally, a few demos are planned: Availability labels for product combinations, by @Hlavtox New options for discountinued products, by @Hlavtox Better managing the order state for backorder products, by @Hlavtox At the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions beforehand.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - November 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on November 9th, 2022. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 01:55 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0 is available! 03:17 Demo: introducing new back office API by @atomiix 11:47 Demo: PrestaShop 8.1 and beyond by @FabienVallon 24:36 Questions & answers (do you have any questions? Fill this form and we’ll answer in the next session).

item.title: Announcing November PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, November 9th, 2022 at 4pm CET! We expect to share with you project news and present two topics: Introducing: new back office API, by @atomiix PrestaShop 8.1 and beyond, by @FabienVallon At the end of every meeting, we hold a Q&A session. You can ask your questions beforehand. If you have some, about things related to the open source project, feel free to ask using this form.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - October 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the seventh time this year and streamed live on October 5th, 2022. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:11 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0 - status update 03:12 Project news: Hacktoberfest 2022 05:10 Project news: Q&A - new format 06:04 Project news: new members in the project 06:55 Pull Requests overview 17:43 Demo: upgrade from 1.7.8 to your own PrestaShop 8.

item.title: Announcing October PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, October 5th, 2022 at 4pm CEST! We expect to share with you project news and present one topic: Update from PrestaShop 1.7.8 to 8.0 using autoupgrade module, by @kpodemski At the end of every meeting, we hold a Q&A session. This month we decided to start gathering questions beforehand. If you have any questions about things related to the open source project feel free to ask using this form.

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public PrestaShop demo from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, September 7, 2022 at 4pm CEST! We expect to share with you project news and present 2 topics: How could we implement the PrestaShop hooks system in Vue components? @NeOMakinG New features for developers in PrestaShop 8 @kpodemski Join us on YouTube! The session will be kept in record on YouTube, so that even if you can’t attend to the live stream, you will still be able to catch up later.

item.title: Announcing July PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public PrestaShop demo from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, July 6, 2022 at 4pm CEST! We expect to share with you project news and present 2 very interesting topics: New password policy by @matks New product page by @jolelievre and @MatShir In addition, @eshraw will present you the new initiative from the Product Team, “Product discovery for v8.1 and above”. Join us on YouTube!

item.title: Announcing June PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, after one month break the next session of the public PrestaShop demo from the maintainers team will happen this week, on Wednesday, June 1, 2022 at 4pm CEST! We expect to share with you project news and present 4 topics: Update on the Horizontal migration by @matks and @tegbessou PHP 8.1 compatibility by @atomiix Improvements for Email alerts module by @marsaldev Update on the Hummingbird theme by @Hlavtox Join us on YouTube!

item.title: Announcing April PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, the next session of the public PrestaShop demo from the maintainers team will happen Wednesday, April 6, 2022 at 4pm CEST! We expect to share with you project news and present 3 topics: New distribution API @atomiix Front office improvements by @Hlavtox Current hummingbird theme state by @NeOMakinG Join us on YouTube! The session will be kept in record on YouTube, so that even if you can’t attend to the live stream, you will still be able to catch up later.

item.title: Announcing March PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, the next session of public demonstration from the maintainers team will happen Wednesday, March 2, 2022 at 4pm CET! We expect to present 3 topics: Horizontal migration by @tegbessou and @matks New page in back office: Security by @matks and @PierreRambaud HTTP 410 status code for products by @kpodemski and @jf-viguier In addition to these demos, we will also announce the result of the poll that decided the name of the new theme ðŸŽ‰

item.title: Announcing February PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, the next session of public demonstration from the maintainers team will happen Wednesday, February 2, 2022 at 4pm CET! We expect to present 4 topics: New PrestaShop theme by @NeOMakinG and @prestascott Improvements for RTL languages by @mparvazi Improvements for Behat tests by @jolelievre Improvements for faceted search and customer management by @hlavtox Join us on YouTube! The session will be kept in record on YouTube, so that even if you can’t attend to the live stream, you will still be able to catch up later.

item.title: PrestaShop Public OSS Demo - January 2022 session
item.description: The project’s twelfth monthly public demo session was held and streamed live on January 5th, 2022. This session presented the latest news of December 2021. The one year milestone We are really proud today because with this session we have performed a full year of public demos! If you want to replay one of the previous demos, you can find them all on the 2021 Recorded Live Demos playlist on YouTube.

item.title: Announcing October PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, the next session of public demonstration from the maintainers team will happen Wednesday, October 6, 2021 at 4pm CEST! We expect to present 3 topics: Next PrestaShop version by @eternoendless Product page discovery by @MatShir and @TristanLDD Content style guide by @Julievrz and @prestascott Join us on YouTube! The session will be kept in record on YouTube, so that even if you can’t attend to the live stream, you will still be able to catch up later.

item.title: PrestaShop Public OSS Demo - July 2021 session
item.description: The project’s seventh monthly public demo session was held and streamed live on August 4, 2021. The session’s agenda was as follows: 01:17 Beginning of the session, introduction 04:02 Presentation of the agenda 05:05 Event rules 06:02 Focus on 1.7.8.0 Release candidate process and timeline by @marionf 09:56 Bug #24103 Adding payment with comma does not work in Order Back office page by @matks 15:12 Bug #24145 Missing 404 for category page that does not exist by @matks 19:50 Closure You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing August PrestaShop Public OSS Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, the next session of public demonstration from the maintainers team will happen Wednesday, August 4, 2021 at 4pm CEST! We expect to present 2 topics: First a focus on 1.7.8.0 Release candidate process and timeline by @marionf Then a Focus on some 1.7.8.0 RC1 most interesting bug fixes: bug #25332: a display issue for product details when using a specific layout, presented by @matthieu-rolland bug #24103: adding payment with comma would fail in Order Back office page, presented by @matks bug #24143: a error happened when visting a disabled category page, presented by @matks Join us on YouTube!
